AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: psychically gifted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a greater awareness of the unseen. After many years at the temple [PAWN_pronoun] learnt how to harness [PAWN_possessive] gift, and hear the whispers of the ancestors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: child slaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically born to be a slaver master. As soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could form coherent sentences [PAWN_nameDef] was bossing around the other children. Within a few years [PAWN_pronoun] had amassed a reasonable number of slaves, most of which were other children.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chimer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born long before the Great Betrayal, before the Dunmer even existed, possibly even before the pilgramage to Resdayn. Needless to say, [PAWN_nameDef] is quite old.
